description.ko: 버려지고 녹슨 기술 부품에서 자라나는 섬세한 디지털 식물을 통해 생명의 끈질긴 생명력을 상징적으로 보여줍니다.
description.en: A metaphor for life's persistence, showing delicate digital flora growing out of abandoned, rusted technological components.

prompt: An intricate digital sunflower blooming from an oxidized copper circuit board, with petals made of #89CFF0 translucent glass and #4A0E4E binary-coded veins that pulse with soft light. Nature is reclaiming technology through #50C878 mossy circuitry and #FFB6C1 glowing fractal pollen floating in the air. 8k resolution, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the digital foliage, soft bokeh background, and cinematic lighting emphasizing the eternal spring of a digital garden.
